title: Episode 16: How Our First Relationship With Parents Impacts Every Relationship We Have
description:
Do you find yourself in relationships where you feel disappointed, unhappy, or like your expectations aren’t met? We repeat the dynamics and patterns we saw when we were little. Knowing this can help us heal our own patterns. If you’re craving more vulnerability and connecting with yourself and the people around you, give this episode a listen.
